meanings.sent1: The government subsidizes farmers to help them grow more food.
meanings.sent2: My parents subsidize my education by paying for my school fees.
meanings.sent3: The generous donation subsidizes the music program at the school.
meanings.sent4: Her hard work subsidizes her dream of traveling around the world.
meanings.sent5: The scholarship subsidizes the cost of attending college for many students.

meanings.sent1: The company subsidizes employee meals in the cafeteria.
meanings.sent2: The government subsidizes public transportation to make it more affordable.
meanings.sent3: The discount coupon subsidizes the cost of buying a new phone.
meanings.sent4: The grant subsidizes research projects in the field of medicine.
meanings.sent5: The scholarship subsidizes the tuition fees for underprivileged students.
